description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_010` |
| **Name** | setTimeout string DOM XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `setTimeout('alert("DOM")',1000)`
